English: A basic currency that you can earn by clearing\nstages or missions.
Use Gold to buy items, upgrade skills\nand enjoy various content!
A cash point in King's Raid.\nIt is used for various kinds of special content, so don't waste it!
Now available in the Premium Shop!
You can earn Rubies as a reward for logging on and completing missions!
Depending on the stage, a certain amount of Stamina is\nconsumed as you play.
The consumed Stamina is recharged by\n1 point over time.
The maximum Stamina increases\nas the team levels up.
Used to fight other players in the\nArena! It is recharged automatically over time.
How to Form a Party?

A party of up to four members is required for battles in King's Raid.\nHeroes for the front line and the back line are decided based on the hero's class.\nHeroes of the same class can also join a party together.
Hero's Skills
Enhance Your Skill!

Skills that you have been learned
can be enhanced to become more powerful.
Spend Gold to enhance skills according to your hero's level.
Get Some Gear!
Equip gear that suits your hero's class.\nYour heroes can become more powerful\nby equipping weapons, armor, secondary gear, and accessories.
Type of Gear?

There are 6 types of weapons: Great Swords, Spears, Daggers, Bows, Guns, and Magic Wands (wizards and priests share weapons). And there are 3 different types of armor and secondary gear: Heavy Armor, Light Armor, and Robes.
Enhance Gear!
Use various materials to upgrade weapons.\nUpgrading becomes more effective\nwhen materials with higher ranks are used.
Rune Types
There are three types of runes:\nAttack, Defense, and Secondary.
Effect of rune (depending on the color)
Red Attack Runes can only be equipped on weapons, Blue Defense Runes can only be equipped on armor, and Green Secondary Runes can only be equipped on secondary gear.
Dungeon with friends!
There are challenging monsters in the party dungeons.\nForm a party with your friends and challenge them.\nRemember, you can't enter the dungeon without a party!
Place of Awakening

The Hall of Heroes consists of the Room of Ordeals,\nwhere you can fight the darkness and acquire materials for awakening, and the Room of Purification,\nwhere you can purify the acquired materials to use them for awakening.
Room of Ordeals
The Room of Ordeals is the only place where you can acquire the Sealed Darkness,\nwhich is required to awaken your heroes.
The Room of Ordeals gate unsealed.

To enter the Room of Ordeals, you need to collect a certain number of fragments of three types for each class.\nOnce you have collected enough fragments, break the Seal! Once opened, the door will not be closed until the Room of Ordeals is cleared.
Room of Purification
You can purify your Sealed Darkness in the Room of Purification.
Room of Purification, entry limit
Heroes who have acquired the\nSealed Darkness from the Room of Ordeals can enter the Room of Purification.
Prepare purification
You need lots of Gold to purify the darkness.\nCollect enough Gold and try purifying.
Orvel
As the capital of the Orvelia Kingdom,\nOrvel offers various features and content for heroes.\nWalk around the town and experience various features and content at the Shop, Stockade, and Arena!
Use the shop!
There are many items sold at the shop.\nWeapons, armor, secondary gear, skill books, and fragments!
The store is out of stock?!

What? Out of stock?
Don't worry. You can use Rubies by tapping the Refresh button to check out new products right away.
Don't forget to visit the shop regularly to check the updated list,
refreshed on an hourly basis.
Creepy stockade

The stockade is a dungeon where you can fight new monsters every day.
The level of monsters varies depending on the difficulty level of the dungeon,
so be well prepared before entering one.
stockade reward
You can collect more skill books\nby clearing the stockades.
Warrior of the Holy Sword\nKasel
Move out! We have to go!\nOr... We will just slash what gets in our way!
Priestess of Light\nFrey
No way! Being alive is a blessing.\nI won't let the Dark Lord do\nany harm to them!
Sorceress of Purgatory\nCleo
Stand aside. Kasel. I will burn them with my flame.
Swift Assassin\nRoi
I'm just doing my job.
Barbarian of Frozen Lands\nGau
Speaking of which,\nmay I test your capacity?
King of Dwarves\nPhillop
Hand Cannon's Hunter\nLakrak
You want to do this, right? (giggle)\nDon't you think I'm like an ordinary goblin...\nAll right, come on!
Shaman of Lightning\nKaulah
Ugh. I won't die here!\nI do not abandon my tribe!\nSpirits, bring me power!
Captivating Demon\nEpis
Hehe.You look so yummy!\nI cannot wait to chop you to pieces.
Wind-piercing Arrow\nSelene
Take out your sword.\nWe are the Elves of the forest.\nWe are not so cowardly as to shoot someone unarmed.
Fallen Witch\nMaria

Stamina is recovered periodically over time.
You can collect Rubies for clearing each battle area for the first time.
3 stockade keys are replenished a day.
You can get Team XP by purchasing heroes, upgrading heroes, and fighting battles.
The performance and value of the gear increases as the grade changes from common to uncommon, rare, heroic, and legendary.
The performance and value of the gear increases with more stars.
If you grind gear, you can obtain magic powder that can be used to enhance your gear options.
If you have two or more of the same gear, try Gear Awakening to raise its star rating.
The maximum upgrade level for an item is determined by its grade.
If you enhance your gear options, each value will rise.
Unique weapons can be enhanced as high as the level of the hero.
Once you open the Room of Ordeals, it will remain open until you clear it.
The best way to get skill books is by clearing the Stockade.
3 Ancient Royal Vault keys are replenished a day.
You can loot a lot of gold from the Ancient Royal Vault.
You can change battle-related options in Game Settings under the Misc. menu.
Preparing for Stream.\nPlease wait!
Your level goes up as you clear stages and\ngain XP. But remember! You cannot\nacquire any rewards if you fail to clear stages.
All heroes in King's Raid can learn four skills.
You can use Active Skills\nby consuming Mana Points.
Passive Skills have consistent effects during battle.
The costume changes and stats increase\nsharply! Awakening can be done up to ★5!
Enhance gear using unnecessary gear as material!\nCan be enhanced up to Lv. 3 (Common), Lv. 5 (Uncommon), Lv. 10 (Rare),\nLv. 15 (Heroic), Lv. 20 (Legendary).

You can increase the skill levels of heroes by consuming Gold at any time.\nBut the skill levels cannot exceed the hero's level (max level 100).\nSo be sure to increase skill levels as heroes level up!
Each battle area on the World Map has four levels of difficulty: Easy, Normal, Hard and Hell.
You can increase Team Level by acquiring / Awakening Heroes, using Stamina, or completing Missions / Achievements.
Upper Dungeons drop Fragments that are required for Hero Awakening.
Each Hero has Unique Gear with unique abilities.\nStrengthen your Heroes through Unique Weapons and Unique Treasures!
You can obtain various rewards by completing Scenario Quests.
Join a Guild to play contents such as Guild Raid, Guild Conquest, and Guild War.\nYou will also earn a variety of benefits as a Guild member!
Do you wish to get stronger?\nYou can strengthen your Gear through Enhance and Awakening.
Climb the Tower of Challenge!\nYou can acquire materials required for crafting an Artifact.
Royal Underground Labyrinth drops Memory Fragments.\nIf you want to obtain Unique Treasures, try clearing it!
If you need Legendary Gear, go for a Raid! Raid drops various Legendary Gear that will enhance your Heroes.
Not enough Essence for Transcendence?\nTry clearing the Tower of Ordeals!
You can recruit Heroes from the Hero's Inn.\nRaise Kinship Rate with the visiting Heroes!
Form a deck of 8 Heroes to challenge the World Boss and obtain rewards based on your ranking!
You can equip a Rune on a Gear that has an empty slot.\nEnhance your Heroes by equipping appropriate Runes!

In Chapter battles, you will score 3 stars if you clear the battle with all of your Heroes alive.\nIf one of your Heroes is knocked out, you will score 2 stars.\nIf two or more Heroes are knocked out, you will score 1 star.
You can check the ranking for Arena, World Boss, and Guild Conquest at the Records of Honor.
Kasel and Frey take off to find Clause who has left with the expedition.
As the master of the Holy Sword, Kasel must endure its burden.
Mistrust and conflict block the path of Kasel and his friends. They must overcome these hardships.
Kasel and his friends face their inner selves - the darkness they wanted to conceal.
Kasel and his friends face the situation where their determination to protect something so dearly has turned into utter despair.
In this mystical desert, Kasel and his friends grow once more.
Grief of loss, torment... Kasel could not do anything for what he saw before his eyes.
As the master of the Holy Sword, taking a step forward is a task that requires tremendous willpower, and...
To protect the smiles of those precious to him, Kasel...
Fight your inner darkness and emerge victorious!
You can proceed to Awakening in the Room of Purification by winning a battle in the Room of Ordeal.
Make sure to use Gold Booster before entering the Ancient Royal Vault!
You can obtain a huge amount of Gold from the Ancient Royal Vault.\nChallenge higher floors for more Gold!
Loman guards this place alone.\nHe carves wooden sculptures every day.
Only the most honest, trusted person in Orvel can guard the Royal Vault.
It is the source of the Royal Family's enormous wealth,\nbut also the source of numerous threats.
No one knows exactly who piled this up here.\nThere are only speculations.
Each Area has different characteristics. Adjust your strategy accordingly to clear the Area.\nCheck on the monster info before you enter.
Always enhance Skill Attributes of your Heroes to make them stronger!
Use Skill Books obtained from the Stockade\nto enhance your Heroes' Skills.
Curious why the prisoners of the Stockade are so docile?\nTalk to Nicky and find out.
Nicky’s weapon, Mace of Rehabilitation, contributed a lot in bringing peace to the Stockade.
If you have committed a crime that led you to the Stockade,\nyou probably have no chance of escaping.
Conquest in each Chapter can be entered 3 times a day.
Clear Conquest if you want to level up your Heroes fast!
Upper Dungeon in each Chapter can be entered 3 times a day.
Running out of Fragments? Try using Loot Booster!
Fragments and Essences are important materials used for Hero Awakening & Transcendence.\nKeep collecting them!
The Tower of Challenge resets every 1st day of the month. Don't forget!
1 Cube of Challenge recharges every 2 hours.\nCollect Artifact Pieces by winning battles.
Use Loot Booster to obtain more Artifact Pieces!
If you have collected 1,000 Artifact Pieces, try using Restore Artifacts!\nYou may obtain a decent Artifact.
The Ancient Magic Golem continuously shocks nearby enemies and has great resistance against M.DMG. Use ranged DMG dealers and Heroes with CC immunity against the Golem.
The Skeleton Totem will regularly summon a horde of Skeleton Soldiers.\nTry to use Heroes with wide-area attack Skills.
The Manticore regularly uses a Skill that deals huge DMG to its enemy in close range.\nUse Skills that nullify the DMG.
The Dragonhead Statue regularly fires a projectile that instantly kills a frontal enemy.\nUse movement Skills or Skills that nullify the DMG.
While immune to CC, your Heroes don't receive DMG from Barbarian of Frozen Lands Gau.
The Harpy Queen regularly uses a Skill that instantly kills an enemy in close range.\nUse Skills that nullify the DMG.

Once the Lava Stones that are summoned by the Blazing Lava Golem fully charge their gauge, your Heroes will take massive M.DMG.\nYou must quickly take down the Lava Stones with Heroes that have wide-area attack Skills.
After a certain time, Infira flies up and continuously deals massive wide-area DMG.\nUse CC Skills to neutralize Infira.
Crow continuously uses powerful Skills.\nYou must interrupt Crow’s Skill use through the constant use of CC Skills.
Lamp of Hell will continuously deal massive DMG to nearby area.\nAlso, it will become immune to CC after being hit by a certain number of CC Skills.
Mirianne's Skills attack the target with the lowest M.DEF.\nTry to protect your Hero during the battle!
The Imperial Army Shieldbearer Captain does not attack, but its DEF is very high.\nAfter being consecutively hit by Crit, it will enrage.
Lucikiel will become stronger the longer he absorbs the power of the crystal.\nYou must prevent him from absorbing the power by using powerful CC Skills.
Lucikiel has high HP Recovery.\nUse Heal Rate Reduction effects to reduce his Heal Rate.
Dosarta never stops honing her skills to make better Artifacts for everyone.\nThat’s actually the reason why there are so many broken Artifact Pieces...
The Elven Royal Family has always had family members who were assigned to the task of guarding the Tower of Challenge.
In human terms, the assigned Elves have to guard the tower alone for a very long time. Therefore, the Elven Royal Family is considering sending two or three family members for the next shift.
Selene occasionally visits the Tower of Challenge to see Dosarta.
No one knows why this tower is called the Tower of Challenge.\nPeople just started calling it one day.
The Darkness Heroes of Ordeals are extremely powerful. Be careful!
You can craft Stone of Infinity with the Fragment of Infinity.
The Tower of Ordeal resets every Monday.
Actually, everyone is curious about what’s underneath Hillia’s hood.
Only those who fight and overcome their inner self may obtain true power.
Sometimes the inner self can appear in the shape of light or the shape of darkness.
Only after finding the way from the battle with oneself\ncan Heroes become stronger.
You can obtain Legendary Gear from Raids.
Don't forget about the Set Option when you are equipping Legendary Gear!
You can knock down the Dragon by depleting the Dragon's CC Gauge with CC Skills.
Dragon Coins you obtained from the Dragon Raid can be used at the Forge.\nUse Dragon Coins to purchase items such as Legendary Gear and more!
The Dragons are sick of being challenged by the warriors every day.
Temeraire’s flame can burn your Heroes down. Be careful of continuous DMG.
Temeraire is an ancient Red Dragon who established its nest within the depths of Dragia Volcano and observed the world from there.
Temeraire harnesses the power of lava and fire.\nHe sometimes ventured out into the human world by taking a form of a blacksmith, and used his power to forge.
Scalaxia is resistant to M.DMG.
Be sure to destroy the Ice Crystals! Your Heroes will take massive DMG if they explode.
Scalaxia is an ancient Frost Dragon who established its nest within Turandana,\nan arctic permafrost located at the farthest edge of Windland mountain range.
Scalaxia’s Frost Dragon body is full of icy energy.\nIt is said that when that energy is not contained, everything in the proximity of the Frost Dragon freezes.
Zyrrkinoth’s poison can be removed if a Hero's HP is restored to the max.
You must quickly eliminate Poison Wyrms and Poison Hatchlings.
Zyrrkinoth is an ancient Poison Dragon who ruled Grimvine,\na swamp of death located at the northern part of Galluah Plains.
Zyrrkinoth is quite nature-friendly. It shares its nest with other creatures.\nThis peculiar dragon is especially fond of slimes, and even raises them as pets.
Armarta uses Dark Flames to weaken its enemies afar.
Be careful of Armarta’s Lightning that strikes down relentlessly.
Armarta is an ancient Black Dragon who is the tyrant of the Ashen Peak,\na ruin located in the southern part of Arrovina Shore.
Armarta’s power is extremely strong even among Dragons.\nIts arrogance knows no bound.
Enhance your Gear through Enchant!\nEnchant Scrolls can be used at the Forge.
There are many types of Enchant Scrolls, and each of them has different Enchantment options.
Clear Raid missions every week to obtain Legendary Enchant Scrolls!
In Hard Mode, Temeraire blocks all P.DMG.
If you get hit by Flame Breath,\nyou must remove the Burns by hitting Temeraire.
In Hard Mode, Scalaxia freezes its enemies much more frequently.\nPrepare yourself with immunity to CC!
Be sure to destroy the Ice Crystals!\nThey will explode after 20 sec, and your Heroes will take massive DMG.
Zyrrkinoth’s poison can be removed if a Hero's HP is restored to the max.
In Hard Mode, Zyrrkinoth has extremely high Crit Resistance.\nYou must raise your Crit Chance!
In Hard Mode, Armarta takes significantly reduced DMG from ranged Heroes.\nUse melee Heroes!
Once Armarta’s Storm is activated, your Heroes will take massive debuff effects.\nYou must remove positive effects from Armata to prevent the storm from being activated.
Take Crystallized Power to Loman, the NPC at Castle, to exchange them for powerful Artifacts.
The World Boss changes every Monday.\nChallenge a new boss every week!
In World Boss, you compete against players from all over the world!
M.DMG is effective against Mountain Fortress.
Once knocked down, Mountain Fortress takes significantly more DMG. Make use of that moment!
When Mountain Fortress activates Defensive Mode, watch out for its Avalanche Skill.
During the development of Mountain Fortress, its body which consists of only rocks gathered much attention.
During the Demon invasion, the Mountain Fortress awakened in middle of the first battle between the Republic of Gray and the Demons.

Theo barely managed to turn Mountain Fortress’s course from attacking the Republic of Gray. However, to this day, Mountain Fortress still roams the mountain range in the vicinity, patrolling the land which belonged to the Technomagic Kingdom in the past.
The Republic of Gray had awakened Mountain Fortress to stop the Demons,\nbut that action ultimately advanced the fall of the Republic.
P.DMG is effective against Protianus.
You must deal high P.DMG in a short period of time to escape from the Water Prison.
Once knocked down, Protianus takes significantly more DMG. Make use of that moment!
If you want to go on an exciting surfing that might cost your life,\nit may be a good idea to ask Protianus.
It is said that the King of Atlantis has immortal, aquatic body.\nIt commands fierce storm attacks to anyone who threatens his kingdom.
Xanadus fights alongside the Abyssal Core.
Whenever Xanadus uses Abyssal Nightmare, the Abyssal Core will reveal itself, and take massive DMG.
Xanadus’ Heal Rate will increase over time.\nUse Skills that reduce Heal Rate.
Actually, Xanadus can speak.\nIt’s just that we don't understand what she says.
Xanadus is an entity who was worshiped as a goddess from an underground empire, which has vanished from history a long ago.
As a ‘goddess,' she only did one thing:\nFulfilling the wish of her followers who passed the trial.
The Golden Porter, regardless of how strong your Heroes are, takes 1 DMG from any attack.\nUse Heroes that attack fast and frequently.
‘Gold Bar of Golden Queen,’ which is the resource required to enter the Repositorium,\ncan be crafted with ‘Gold Dust of Golden Queen’, which is an item you receive whenever you consume Stamina.
The Royal Underground Labyrinth resets on the 16th of every month. Challenge it again!
The special effect of the Royal Underground Labyrinth changes each time it resets.
In the Labyrinth of Defense, HP of Knights increases.\nUse the Knights to your advantage!
Heroes with high Max HP have an advantage in the Labyrinth of Defense.
If allies got exiled, use Skills multiple times to rescue them!
In the Labyrinth of Charge, DMG of Warriors increases.\nUse the Warriors to your advantage!
Reduce the CC Gauge to neutralize the enemy’s massive blow.
In the Labyrinth of Ambush, ATK Spd of Assassins increases.\nUse the Assassins to your advantage!
Eliminate the goblin with a bomb as soon as possible!
In the Labyrinth of Aim, DEF Penetration of Archers increases.\nUse the Archers to your advantage!
In the Labyrinth of Aim, negative effects will be stacked.\nBe careful not to get too many negative effects stacked on your Heroes!
When El Rosed summons Dark Elves, you must eliminate them quickly.
In the Labyrinth of Penetration, Crit DMG of Mechanics increases.\nUse the Mechanics to your advantage!
The enemy will gain an effect that reflects DMG if it gets hit many times.\nTry taking down the enemy with as few hits as possible.
In the Labyrinth of Explosion, MP Recovery of Wizards increases.\nUse the Wizards to your advantage!
Spider Egg regularly spawns many spiders.\nUse wide-area attack Skills!
In the Labyrinth of Heal, Heal Rate of Priests increases.\nUse the Priests to your advantage!
When FlaFla’s poison cloud is activated, it deals massive DMG to both allies and enemies.
There’s a Unique Costume you can only obtain by completing a Substory.
Memory Fragments are given as a reward for completing a Substory. You can craft a Random Unique Treasure Ticket with them.
Urkak is the corrupted king of the goblins of the underground.\nHe is a mutant who was born with the size of an ogre.
Satria is the elder sister of Balalaika, the Harpy Queen.\nShe was the queen who came before Balalaika, and also the first Harpy to accept the power of the darkness.
Kerberen is a vicious murderer whom even Sieg could not control. Should you encounter Kerberen, run.
This abominable giant skeleton that takes neither the form of a human nor a monster\nis a bizarre Undead, which is composed of the bones from a Giant Wyrm, Ogre, Troll, Orc, and other monsters.

Sithrael is the best Dark Elven Sword Mage who served the Dark Elven King Timorel as his bodyguard. A genius at both moonlight magic and swordsmanship, Sithrael is also the leader of a house known to have guarded the royal family for generations.
Garrow is a Lizardman mutant who is much bigger than average Lizardmen.\nWatch out for his wild, agile attacks.

As a general of the Frost Giants, Thorpe was the right-hand man of their former king, Tarkas.\nHis charisma earned him great popularity, and many considered him a worthy candidate to be the next king.

Kallax is a Draconic Warrior who used to be the right-hand man of the Draconic Commander during the Demon War. He earned the nickname of ‘pure evil,’ since he enjoyed slaughtering a countless number of dragons and devouring their soul.
Kallax is one of the few Draconics who gained a personality after devouring a dragon.
Urkak’s minions primarily attack the marked target.\nProtect the marked Hero while eliminating the minions with wide-area attacks.
Satria’s ‘Harpy’s Swiftness’ status nullifies all DMG.\nUse Heroes with high ATK Spd and multiple hits.
Kerberen adds a stack of ‘Rage of the Butcher’ upon himself whenever he uses a Skill.\nUse Heroes with strong CC Skills to neutralize Kerberen before Rage of the Butcher reaches 5 stacks.
Obrigard summons the Skull of Demon which is immune to either P.DMG or M.DMG.\nForm a party with a mix of Physical/Magic DMG Heroes.

Sithrael is buffed with high DMG Reduction through ‘Moonlight's Protection,’\nbut it is weakened temporarily whenever Sithrael's opponents use a Skill.\nUse Heroes that can frequently use their Skills.

Garrow’s ‘Brutal Ambush’ deals massive DMG to Heroes in melee range,\nhealing its HP greatly based on the amount of DMG dealt.\nUse Heroes with Heal Rate Reduction effect as well as Heroes that deal ranged DMG.

Thorpe possesses a variety of Skills that inflict Freeze, and if its barrier is not broken when it uses ‘Avalanche Blast,’ your Heroes will take massive DMG. Use Heroes with Skills that dispel negative effects as well as Heroes that can deal massive DMG in a short period of time.

When your Heroes become inflicted with ‘Calamity Flare,’ they will keep receiving DMG over time. You must quickly recover Mana to remove the effect. Use Heroes that can recover the Mana of their allies.

Kallax randomly places a stack of ‘Draconic Stigma’ either on himself or enemies. If you don’t remove this effect quickly, it will either strengthen Kallax or inflict critical DMG on your team. Use Heroes that can remove enemy's positive effects and allies' negative effects.
Strike Tyrfas with multiple M.DMG dealing attacks to prevent him from using Avalanche!
Do you think Tyrfas would be slow as it is a turtle?\nYes, you are right.
Tyrfas is the Divine Beast of the Eternal Earth, the first ground that came into existence.
Tyrfas is the Divine Beast of life and karma,\nwho guided the lives of all creatures with wisdom.
One of Tyrfas's important power\nwas helping the creatures die with spiritual purity.
Unfortunately, Tyrfas became corrupt after absorbing filthy energy of the evildoers.\nIts current look is the result of losing its inner peace, and its body being frozen.
Once Lakreil starts throwing Deadly Boomerang, defend yourself from it through high Dodge Chance.
Lakreil gets sad if the Boomerang doesn’t return to him.
Lakreil is a tragic Lizardman warrior who lost its sanity due to Malduk’s experiment.
Lakreil’s fury grew as he was experimented by Malduk.\nAs a result, he directed that fury toward Malduk only.
Malduk went through quite a trouble neutralizing Lakreil.\nAfterwards, he decided to just neglect Lakreil altogether.
Eliminate the Executioner’s Casket quickly to prevent Hellfire.
Rescue your allies from the Zone of Inferno quickly!
Velkazar believes that the temperature of lava is ideal for warming the body.
Velkazar is one of the oldest Ancient Demons in existence.\nHe is feared even among the high-rank Demons.
Velkazar is the evilest great Demon who enjoys consuming the soul of those who defied him\nand torturing their souls by burning them eternally within.
According to an ancient tome, Velkazar appeared in the material world once, in the past.
You can acquire Ether from Eclipse.
Eclipse is a dungeon where you use several teams to fight against the infinite number of waves.
In Eclipse, Heal Rate of Heroes will gradually decrease as Heroes progress into the next waves.
To escape the Barrier of the Blood Mood, you either fight till death\nor find the Core of Darkness and destroy it.
If a Being of Darkness that is weaker than the Core of Darkness approaches the core, there’s a high chance that it will get absorbed into the core.
Lewisia has been purifying Core of Darkness for a long time.
Darkness existed since the beginning of time.
The power that the Vampires wield is different from the power that the Demons wield.
The moon you see within the Barrier of the Blood Moon is not real.
Take Mystical Soul Fragments to Cain for Soul Judgment. You may acquire a Soulstone.
Gather Soulstone Ticket Fragments of each Hero Class to obtain a Soulstone of the corresponding Hero Class.
Soulstones are materials required for unleashing or advancing a Soul Weapon.
The King’s Sanctum is a sacred place where the King and only a warrior chosen by the King could enter to give prayers to the kings of the desert of the past.
Imet, the Desert Courage, occasionally forgets that its fur is made of stone and tries to groom its mane.
The feather of Musama, the Eye of the Sun, may look soft, but it is actually razor-sharp. Be careful not to get hurt.
Sekmaha, the Envoy of the Flow, can sometimes be spotted swimming in the oasis outside the sanctum.
Cain’s temple usually stays asleep under the sandstorm of the desert.\nIt reveals itself only to the call of Cain or the successor of the desert chosen by Cain.
Ally with low P.DEF should watch out for [Swift Execution]!
Deplete Imet's CC gauge to heal HP.
While Healing Field is active, Relic of the Sky is immune to DMG and negative effects.
Musama's [Tempest Sand] Skill reflects DMG. Be careful.
The Skill effect changes depending on the state of flow.\nHowever, there is a way to control the flow. Try to use that to your advantage.
Keep your Mana high! It will be of big help.
Each Eclipse wave has a different debuff.
The curse effects inflicted from each Boss in Eclipse battles will remain until the battle ends.
